episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Cariboo Innovation Stories
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Cariboo Innovation Stories.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down Fireworks AI Positions Open-Source Infrastructure as Low-Cost, Privacy-Focused Backbone for Personal AI Agents and Inside the Collapse of Tech's Most Ambitious AI Infrastructure Deal: How Nvidia and OpenAI's $100 Billion Partnership Unraveled, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into cariboo innovation stories, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
